courses.title: Guitar Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of playinf guitar with our comprehensive beginner's course.

courses.title: Piano Mastery
courses.description: Unlock the secrets of the piano with our advanced course designed for experienced players.

courses.title: Vocal Training
courses.description: Develop your vocal range and technique with personalized training sessions led by experienced vocal coaches.

courses.title: Music Theory Essentials
courses.description: Master the fundamentals of music theory, including notation, scales, chords, and harmony.

courses.title: Drum Workshop
courses.description: Explore various drumming styles and techniques through hands-on workshops and group sessions.

courses.title: Songwriting Bootcamp
courses.description: Unleash your creativity and learn the art of crafting compelling songs through intensive workshops and feedback sessions.
